name: DbTools.java - Java Database Access
short_description:
DBTools.java is makes accessing SQL databases pleasant and
simple. Loosly based on ideas from the Rogue-Wave DBTools.h++ C++ access library (which is very nice). This project has now been absorbed into the Java Tools (javatools.sourceforge.net) project.
